value.stringValue: A simple transactional sale with no formal tender processes
A sale involving a formal tender process (eg: RFI and/or RFP)

decisions.description: Was a Competitor Service selected by the user? If so, continue. If not then skip.
decisions.name: Competitor_Service_Selected_Decision
decisions.label: Competitor Service Selected?

decisions.description: Check to see if the selected Contract already has an Open Renewal (Extension/Rebid). If it does then show the user a message to say that a renewal opp already exists for the Contract and redirect them to the open Opp.
decisions.name: Contract_Already_have_Renewal_Decision
decisions.label: Contract Already have Renewal?

decisions.description: Which Action did the user select on the warning screen?
decisions.name: Duplicate_Continue_Action_Decision
decisions.label: Duplicate Continue Action

decisions.description: Evaluate the running user's permissions to determine whether they should be given a choice, or automatically set as Full or Lite Opportunity.
decisions.name: Eligible_Record_Type_Decision
decisions.label: Eligible Record Type Decision

decisions.description: Is the new Opp for Extension or Rebid?
decisions.name: Extension_or_Rebid_Decision
decisions.label: Extension or Rebid?

dynamicChoiceSets.description: This Record Choice Set is for the Primary Contact choice lookup component on the Opportunity Details screen. Get the filtered collection of Contacts related to the Account. Filter condition: Contact.AccountId={!recordId}.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: Contact_choiceSet

formulas.description: Return TRUE or FALSE whether running user has Create SCOTSMAN custom permission.
formulas.name: f_Create_SCOTSMAN_Permission

recordCreates.description: For the newly created Opportunity add the Competitor Account Role record.
recordCreates.name: Create_Competitor_Record_Account
recordCreates.label: Create Competitor Account Role (Account)

recordCreates.description: For the newly created Opportunity add the Competitor as the Incumbent.
recordCreates.name: Create_Incumbent_Account_Role_Account
recordCreates.label: Create Incumbent Account Role (Account)

recordLookups.description: Get the Active Contracts for this Account.
recordLookups.name: Get_Account_s_Active_Contracts
recordLookups.label: Get Account's Active Contracts

recordLookups.description: Get the Account's Competitor Services that do not already link to an Opportunity to allow the user to select them in the following screen.
recordLookups.name: Get_Competitor_Services
recordLookups.label: Get Competitor Services

recordLookups.description: Get created Opportunity from the Opportunity ID so that the Opp Record Var can be used as input into the SCOTSMAN Generation Subflow
recordLookups.name: Get_New_Opp
recordLookups.label: Get New Opp

recordUpdates.description: Link the triggering Competitor Service and any other Competitor Services that related to the same Source Opportunity to the newly created Opportunity.
recordUpdates.name: Link_Competitor_Services_to_Opportunity
recordUpdates.label: Link Competitor Services to Opportunity

fields.name: Contract_Selection_Message
fields.fieldText: Please select the Contract this {!Type1} Opportunity relates to.

value.stringValue: Is the relevant Contract listed above?

fields.name: Contract_Not_Available_Message
fields.fieldText:
Any {!Type1} Opportunity that does not link to a Contract will cause a new Contract to be created when it is Closed Won. It is strongly recommended that all Renewal Opportunities are linked to Contracts.


To continue without linking a Contract please continue.

validationRule.errorMessage: Reference must be no more than 122 characters. Please reduce the length of the Reference and try again.

fields.name: Process_Start_Date_Message
fields.fieldText: Note: The date you actively started pursuing this Opportunity

validationRule.errorMessage: Expected Award Date must be before Expected Contract Start Date

value.stringValue: Will you need a SCOTSMAN for this Opportunity?

validationRule.errorMessage: Primary Source value of Internal Target is not allowed. Please select a different Primary Source.

fields.name: Renewal_Exists_Warning_Message
fields.fieldText:
Renewal Opportunity Warning


An open {!Contracts_Table.firstSelectedRow.Rebid_Opportunity__r.Type} Opportunity for this Contract already exists and so it is suggested to use that Opportunity instead of creating another.


Existing Opportunity: {!Contracts_Table.firstSelectedRow.Rebid_Opportunity__r.Name}


A Contract should normally only have one open Renewal Opportunity (either Extension/Rebid) at a time unless in very specific circumstances.

fields.name: Override_Duplicate_Checkbox
fields.fieldText: I understand an open Renewal Opportunity already exists but I still want to create a new Renewal Opportunity

fields.name: Select_Competitor_Service_Screen_DT
fields.fieldText:
Select Competitor Service


Because you selected Competitor Service as the source of this Opportunity please select the Competitor Service that this Opportunity relates to.

fields.name: Competitor_Service_Not_Available_Toggle_True_DT
fields.fieldText: If the related Competitor Service is not shown then change the Competitor Service Found toggle to No and click Continue.

fields.name: Competitor_Service_Toggle_Disabled_DT
fields.fieldText: You have chosen not to relate this Opportunity to a Competitor Service.

fields.name: hErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
An error has occurred whilst creating an Opportunity.


An error log has been created. Please give your System Admin these details:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

subflows.description: Check access to the originating record to ensure the user has Edit access to it before proceeding towards Opportunity creation.
subflows.name: Check_Record_Access
subflows.label: Check Record Access

variables.description: ID of the Record Type to be used when creating the Opportunity.
variables.name: v_Record_Type_Id
